title: How to Make a Strawberry Chicken Salad

steps.headline: Combine the dressing ingredients together in a small bowl.
steps.description: Stir with a whisk until a brownish mixture starts to form. Set the dressing aside for later usage. Pour some of the dressing into 1 cup. Part of the dressing will be used to marinate the chicken.

steps.headline: Cook the chicken using a large skillet.
steps.description: Stir with the vegetable oil and butter until the chicken loses its pinkish color and begins to brown.

steps.headline: Drain the excess oil and butter from the skillet.
steps.description: Add the cup of salad dressing to the chicken and marinate it, turning it with a fork. Continue to do this for another minute.

steps.headline: Add the salad greens to a bowl.
steps.description: Top with your chicken, nuts, and strawberries. If desired, use additional strawberries to add a colorful garnish to the top of the salad.

text: Combine the dressing ingredients together in a small bowl. Stir with a whisk until a brownish mixture starts to form. Set the dressing aside for later usage. Pour some of the dressing into 1 cup. Part of the dressing will be used to marinate the chicken. Cook the chicken using a large skillet. Stir with the vegetable oil and butter until the chicken loses its pinkish color and begins to brown. Drain the excess oil and butter from the skillet. Add the cup of salad dressing to the chicken and marinate it, turning it with a fork. Continue to do this for another minute. Add the salad greens to a bowl. Top with your chicken, nuts, and strawberries. If desired, use additional strawberries to add a colorful garnish to the top of the salad. Finished.
